title: Any Rioters for my 1000th win ? :D
body:
Hi , i heard that if you are close to get your 1000th win , some rioters will enjoy playing with you , is it possible for my 1000th win ? :D

Would love to play with some of you ! 

Thanks a lot :)

replies.body:
We did it ! Was a real pleasure ! 

(Except she's expert to steal penta's.... :3)


Katey ♥


Thanks ♥

when you want Katey ! :D
I'm in the EUW server , is that a problem tho ?
I have about 15 hours free time so when you want ! :)
To be honest , i didn't know where i could put this message so rioters can read me , please tell me if i'm in the right place or not :d
id like to play with you man :)
